text:
@RahulGandhi Perfect time Mr. @RahulGandhi to bring back the nation's treasure which your father and family deposited in swizz accounts and distribute among poor. 

As a legal heir you can do it. Come on !

Indian will be thankful to you for lifetime.

#coronavirus 
#IndiaFightsCorona
